title: In A First Since Taliban Rule, Afghanistan Says To Attend UN Climate Talks
content: An Afghan delegation will attend the upcoming UN climate change summit in Azerbaijan, the foreign ministry spokesman told AFP on Saturday, marking a first since the Taliban government came to power.
summary: An Afghan delegation will attend the upcoming UN climate change summit in Azerbaijan, the foreign ministry spokesman told AFP on Saturday, marking a first since the Taliban government came to power.

title: Israelis Fear For Hostages As Qatar Halts Gaza Mediation
content: Israeli protesters expressed concern for hostages in Gaza Saturday, after Qatar said it was pulling back as a key mediator for a ceasefire that would help bring the captives home.
summary: Israeli protesters expressed concern for hostages in Gaza Saturday, after Qatar said it was pulling back as a key mediator for a ceasefire that would help bring the captives home.

title: Putin Signs Into Law Mutual Defence Treaty With North Korea
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed into law a treaty on the country's strategic partnership with North Korea which includes a mutual defence provision, according to a decree published on Saturday.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed into law a treaty on the country's strategic partnership with North Korea which includes a mutual defence provision, according to a decree published on Saturday.

title: Israel Army Slams Soldiers For Burning Lebanese Flag In Viral Video
content: The Israeli military on Saturday accused a group of soldiers of burning a Lebanese flag in southern Lebanon where they are fighting the Iran-backed group Hezbollah.
summary: The Israeli military on Saturday accused a group of soldiers of burning a Lebanese flag in southern Lebanon where they are fighting the Iran-backed group Hezbollah.

title: Several Children Among 40 Killed In Israeli Strikes, Says Lebanon
content: Israeli airstrikes on Lebanon over the last day have killed at least 40 people including several children, Lebanese authorities said on Saturday, after heavy Israeli bombardment pounded the southern suburbs of the capital Beirut overnight.
summary: Israeli airstrikes on Lebanon over the last day have killed at least 40 people including several children, Lebanese authorities said on Saturday, after heavy Israeli bombardment pounded the southern suburbs of the capital Beirut overnight.

title: Kate Middleton Attends Remembrance Day Event In Return To Public Duties
content: Britain's Princess Kate attended a Remembrance Day event in London on Saturday, in her latest public engagement after undergoing preventive treatment for cancer this year.
summary: Britain's Princess Kate attended a Remembrance Day event in London on Saturday, in her latest public engagement after undergoing preventive treatment for cancer this year.

title: Watch: This Alligator Named Darth Gator Only Emerges To His 'Theme Song'
content: Shared by Gator Boys star Paul Bedard, the viral video shows the alligator emerging from his den to the tune of the iconic song.
summary: Shared by Gator Boys star Paul Bedard, the viral video shows the alligator emerging from his den to the tune of the iconic song.

title: Joe Biden, Donald Trump To Meet At White House On Wednesday
content: US leader Joe Biden will receive President-elect Donald Trump at the White House on Wednesday, the presidency said in a statement.
summary: US leader Joe Biden will receive President-elect Donald Trump at the White House on Wednesday, the presidency said in a statement.

title: Chinese Man Duped Of Rs 11 Lakh By Fiancee In "Marriage Bed Burning" Scam
content: In a unique online romance scam, a man in Tianjin, China, fell victim to a bizarre "marriage bed burning" ritual, costing him Rs 11 lakh.
summary: In a unique online romance scam, a man in Tianjin, China, fell victim to a bizarre "marriage bed burning" ritual, costing him Rs 11 lakh.

title: Man Found Floating In Ocean Near Australia 24 Hours After He Fell Off Ship
content: A sailor was found floating in the middle of the ocean several nautical miles off the coast of Australia more than a day after he fell overboard a cargo ship.
summary: A sailor was found floating in the middle of the ocean several nautical miles off the coast of Australia more than a day after he fell overboard a cargo ship.

title: "Avoiding Mention Of Khalistanis": Canadian MP Slams Politicians
content: Days after an attack on Hindus at a Brampton temple, Canadian MP Chandra Arya has come down heavily on politicians pitting Hindus and Sikhs on "opposing sides".
summary: Days after an attack on Hindus at a Brampton temple, Canadian MP Chandra Arya has come down heavily on politicians pitting Hindus and Sikhs on "opposing sides".

title: Explained: What Is The Point Of COP29, An Annual UN Climate Summit?
content: Tens of thousands of people from around the globe will gather next week for COP29, the annual UN climate summit, in Azerbaijan's capital of Baku.
summary: Tens of thousands of people from around the globe will gather next week for COP29, the annual UN climate summit, in Azerbaijan's capital of Baku.

title: Qatar Pulls Out As Key Mediator For Gaza Ceasefire: Report
content: Qatar has withdrawn as a key mediator for a Gaza ceasefire and hostage deal.
summary: Qatar has withdrawn as a key mediator for a Gaza ceasefire and hostage deal.

title: Israeli Strikes Target Lebanon's Tyre City, 7, Including 2 Children Killed
content: Lebanon's health ministry said Saturday seven people including two children were killed in Israeli strikes on the southern city of Tyre a day earlier, with rescuers still searching for missing people under the rubble.
summary: Lebanon's health ministry said Saturday seven people including two children were killed in Israeli strikes on the southern city of Tyre a day earlier, with rescuers still searching for missing people under the rubble.

title: UK's Queen Camilla To Miss Remembrance Day Events Due To Illness
content: Britain's Queen Camilla will not attend Remembrance Day events to recover from a chest infection, but hopes to return to public duties early next week, Buckingham Palace said on Saturday.
summary: Britain's Queen Camilla will not attend Remembrance Day events to recover from a chest infection, but hopes to return to public duties early next week, Buckingham Palace said on Saturday.

title: Slow Warnings, Poor Defences: How Spain Was Exposed To Deadly Floods
content: Dozens of inhabitants of flooded communities said that by the time they received the regional government's alert, muddy water was already surrounding their cars, submerging streets of their towns and pouring into their homes.
summary: Dozens of inhabitants of flooded communities said that by the time they received the regional government's alert, muddy water was already surrounding their cars, submerging streets of their towns and pouring into their homes.

title: Google Searches Skyrocket 1,514% After Donald Trump's Historic Comeback
content: Trump's win, marking his second non-consecutive term as the 47th US President, has divided public opinion.

title: Insight: Trump's Red Wave Explained In Graphs, And Where Harris Fell Short
content: From New York to the Rio Grande Valley, across big cities like Miami and San Francisco, in college towns and subdivision-dotted exurbs, the US electorate this year shifted unmistakably rightward.

title: Explained: How The Trump Presidency Will Impact The Global Economy
content: Donald Trumps victory in the 2024 election  and his threat to impose tariffs on all imports to the United States  highlights an important problem for the global economy.

title: Asteroid Strikes Earth Hours After Detection, 3rd Imminent Impactor Of 2024
content: The asteroid was first observed on October 22 by the Asteroid Terrestrial-impact Last Alert System (ATLAS) survey in Hawaii.
